channel.title: Anyone know some video game developers?
channel.description: Im looking for some game developers or someone who I could reach out to about my soundtrack music, I have some great soundtracks ive been working on perfect for games.

item.title: Anyone know some video game developers?
item.dc:creator: blakkaz
item.description:
The TIGSource Forums might be a good place to start.
Heaps of indie devs there to reach out to, as well as a dedicated jobs board.

They have a Discord server as well.

Read full topic
